properties.name: domain_name
properties.description: (Required) A domain name for which the certificate should be issued

properties.name: subject_alternative_names
properties.description: (Optional) A list of domains that should be SANs in the issued certificate

properties.name: validation_method
properties.description: (Required) Which method to use for validation. DNS or EMAIL are valid, NONE can be used for certificates that were imported into ACM and then into Terraform.

properties.name: tags
properties.description: (Optional) A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

properties.name: certificate_arn
properties.description: (Required) The ARN of the certificate that is being validated.

properties.name: validation_record_fqdns
properties.description: (Optional) List of FQDNs that implement the validation. Only valid for DNS validation method ACM certificates. If this is set, the resource can implement additional sanity checks and has an explicit dependency on the resource that is implementing the validation

properties.name: create
properties.description: (Default 45m) How long to wait for a certificate to be issued.
